title: Unveiling the influence of end-capped acceptors modification on photovoltaic properties of non-fullerene fused ring compounds: a DFT/TD-DFT study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20441-20453
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03170A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Muhammad Khalid, Noor Fatima, Muhammad Arshad, Muhammad Adeel, Ataualpa A. C. Braga, Tansir Ahamad
Herein, unique A–D–A configuration-based molecules (NBD1–NBD7) were designed from the reference compound (NBR) by utilizing the end-capped acceptor modification approach.
